name: combustibility
content:
combustibility noun [U]
(BURNING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being combustible (= able to burn easily), or the degree to which something burns easily : The grass's combustibility is inherent in its pattern of growth. They conducted experiments into the combustibility of the products used in mattresses.
More examplesFewer examplesThe report found that combustibility of insulation was one cause of the fire.

combustibility noun [U]
(TROUBLE)
